description: Number of protruded partitions of n with largest part at most 6.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
R. P. Stanley, A Fibonacci lattice, Fib. Quart., 13 (1975), 215-232.
R. P. Stanley, Ordered structures and partitions, Memoirs of the Amer. Math. Soc., no. 119 (1972).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
